thread.title: Cornell fulfills acoustic rock desires with 'Higher Truth'
thread.title_full: Cornell fulfills acoustic rock desires with 'Higher Truth'

author: MARCELA ISAZA
title: Cornell fulfills acoustic rock desires with 'Higher Truth'
text:
Casey Curry Cornell fulfills acoustic rock desires with 'Higher Truth' 
In this July 29, 2015 photo, Chris Cornell poses for a portrait to promote his latest album, "Higher Truth," at The Paramount Ranch in Agoura Hills, Calif. (Photo by Casey Curry/Invision/AP) Casey Curry Cornell fulfills acoustic rock desires with 'Higher Truth' 
In this July 29, 2015 photo, Chris Cornell poses for a portrait to promote his latest album, "Higher Truth," at The Paramount Ranch in Agoura Hills, Calif. (Photo by Casey Curry/Invision/AP) Casey Curry Cornell fulfills acoustic rock desires with 'Higher Truth' 
In this July 29, 2015 photo, Chris Cornell poses on a horse during a portrait session to promote his latest album, "Higher Truth," at The Paramount Ranch in Agoura Hills, Calif. (Photo by Casey Curry/Invision/AP) Casey Curry Cornell fulfills acoustic rock desires with 'Higher Truth' 
In this July 29, 2015 photo, Chris Cornell poses while on the set of a music video to promote his latest album, "Higher Truth," at The Paramount Ranch in Agoura Hills, Calif. (Photo by Casey Curry/Invision/AP) Casey Curry Cornell fulfills acoustic rock desires with 'Higher Truth' 
In this July 29, 2015 photo, Chris Cornell poses for a portrait to promote his latest album, "Higher Truth," at The Paramount Ranch in Agoura Hills, Calif. (Photo by Casey Curry/Invision/AP) Casey Curry Cornell fulfills acoustic rock desires with 'Higher Truth' 
In this July 29, 2015 photo, Chris Cornell poses for a portrait to promote his latest album, "Higher Truth," at The Paramount Ranch in Agoura Hills, Calif. (Photo by Casey Curry/Invision/AP) Casey Curry Cornell fulfills acoustic rock desires with 'Higher Truth' 
In this July 29, 2015 photo, Chris Cornell plays guitar while on set during a portrait session to promote his latest album, "Higher Truth," at The Paramount Ranch in Agoura Hills, Calif. (Photo by Casey Curry/Invision/AP) Posted: Thursday, October 1, 2015 11:09 am | Updated: 2:01 pm, Thu Oct 1, 2015. Cornell fulfills acoustic rock desires with 'Higher Truth' Associated Press | 
AGOURA HILLS, Calif. (AP) â€” Chris Cornell has a new album out that's so toned down he said it's meant to be played in the bathroom on his acoustic guitar. 
"Higher Truth" isn't grunge or his typical rock 'n' roll, its songs tell stories with guitars, carefully crafted arrangements and, of course, his strong, raspy voice. Subscription Required An online service is needed to view this article in its entirety. You
